text: With four doing the job and the waves pushing at the stern, the yawl was soon dragged out but before it was turned over Bueno Buck reached into the foot of water, tossed out a string of silvery lake trout and said - 3'Bill, he's better man at catch 'em than Injun, Judge. You look. Little one more as fifteen inches. Maybe big one four feet, huh?

name: Bueno Buck
